Frog pond plop

visual poem translation
2014
object

Inspired by the famous frog haiku by Bashô, I wanted to create my own translation.

古池や
蛙飛び込む
水の音

ふるいけや
かわずとびこむ
みずのおと

Furu ike ya
kawazu tobikomu
mizu no oto

Old pond!
frog jumps in
water’s sound

transparent domed stickers
Wildness Knows the Score
essay on collection
